about_the_game:
Immortal Guns is a new FPS game with a powerful level editor. The game offers multiple game modes, maps, and weapons that can be fully customized with an intuitive drag & drop interface. The level editor is a powerful, easy-to-use tool with a terrain and object editor that lets you build, share and play your levels with friends.



Immortal Guns is currently in early access. We are actively developing new maps, adding new weapons and game modes. Our vision is to enable players to play and enjoy the levels they build with their friends online.

✔️Online multiplayer
✔️Powerful level editor
✔️Offline custom levels with bots

Game Modes

Team Deathmatch
Kill enemy players in a fight for domination. The team with the highest number of kills at the end of the round wins.

Free for All
You’re on your own! The player with the highest number of kills at the end of the round wins.

Zombie Horde
Play co-op with friends and try to survive against waves of zombies.

The Level Editor

Forge your own levels
Create custom terrain with a powerful terrain editor and add objects to make your own levels. Go further by tweaking engine settings like run speed and game modes.

Add vehicles and jump-pads
Add vehicles and jump pads to your levels to create a fun and wacky experience.

Upcoming Features

More weapons

More level editor assets
Unique game modes
Character and gun skins

short_description: Immortal Guns is a multiplayer mobile FPS with a powerful sandbox level editor. Build, share and play your levels with friends. Create custom terrain and add from a selection of over 100 objects to make your own levels. Go further by tweaking engine settings like run speed and game modes.
